name: OBLIVION
description: As human beings, we have a lot of imperfections. One of them is forgetfulness. we tend to forget a lot of things and sometimes small things, the capacity of our brain to store information has limitations. one of the functions of our brain is to let go of other information as you can see in the animation. and the reality when we pass on this planet, we will be forgotten, that's why the machine help to store a lot of information, but it is still fragile. when the machine fails, the memories will be forgotten. the purpose of this art is to remind that oblivions is real. when the time remaining on this planet is not spent properly, this era is nothing but an oblivion grave.
